description.lang: HS-FC200+ is a Z-Wave controllable wired fan controller for use with 3-speed or 4-speed ceiling fans. It has a vertical row of LEDs that indicate the fan speed level. Works with 3-speed or 4-speed fans only 4 segment LED dim level indicator Remotely or manually turns ON or OFF, or fan speed level Fits standard wall plates (wall plate not included) Works with any certified gateway supporting Z-Wave
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline

name.lang: Sets LED indicator mode of operation

description.lang: 0=Fan Controller LED acts like a Fan Controller1=Fan Controller LED acts like a status indicator (LEDs should display the current fan speed level when you tap the paddle)
0=Fan Controller LED acts like a Fan Controller 1=Fan Controller LED acts like a status indicator (LEDs should display the current fan speed level when you tap the paddle)

name.lang: Sets the Normal mode LED color

description.lang: Sets the default LED color when the Fan Controller is NOT in status mode. All LEDS will use this color in this mode. The color values are:0=White1=Red2=Green3=Blue4=Magenta5=Yellow6=Cyan
Sets the default LED color when the Fan Controller is NOT in status mode. All LEDS will use this color in this mode. The color values are:0=White 1=Red 2=Green 3=Blue 4=Magenta 5=Yellow 6=Cyan

name.lang: Sets status mode LED 1 bottom color

description.lang: Sets status mode LED 1 bottom color0=Off1=Red2=Green3=Blue4=Magenta5=Yellow6=Cyan7=White
Sets status mode LED 1 bottom color0=Off 1=Red 2=Green 3=Blue 4=Magenta 5=Yellow 6=Cyan 7=White
Sets status mode LED 2 color0=Off1=Red2=Green3=Blue4=Magenta5=Yellow6=Cyan7=White
Sets status mode LED 2 color0=Off 1=Red 2=Green 3=Blue 4=Magenta 5=Yellow 6=Cyan 7=White
Sets status mode LED 3 color0=Off1=Red2=Green3=Blue4=Magenta5=Yellow6=Cyan7=White
Sets status mode LED 3 color0=Off 1=Red 2=Green 3=Blue 4=Magenta 5=Yellow 6=Cyan 7=White
Sets status mode LED 4 color0=Off1=Red2=Green3=Blue4=Magenta5=Yellow6=Cyan7=White
Sets status mode LED 4 color0=Off 1=Red 2=Green 3=Blue 4=Magenta 5=Yellow 6=Cyan 7=White
Nightlight Mode, sets bottom LED operation (in normal mode).0= bottom LED on if load is off.1= off if load is off
0= bottom LED on if load is off. 1= off if load is off

name.lang: Sets the Blink frequency for All LEDs in Status mode

description.lang: Sets the Blink frequency for All LEDs in Status modePossible values: 0-2550= No blink, 1=100ms (100 ms off then 100ms on)
0= No blink, 1=100ms (100 ms off then 100ms on)

name.lang: Sets LEDs 1-4 to Blink in Status mode

description.lang: Bitmask defines specific LEDs to enable for blinking.Note: this decimal value is derived from a hex code calculation based on the following:0x01 = led 10x02 = led 20x04 = led 30x08 = led 40 = All LED's disabled1 = LED 12 = LED 23 = LED 1 and 24 = LED 35 = LED 3 and 16 = LED 3 and 27 = LED 3 and 2 and 18 = LED 49 = LED 4 and 110 = LED 4 and 211 = LED 4 and 2 and 112 = LED 4 and 313 = LED 4 and 3 and 114 = LED 4 and 3 and 215 = LED 4 and 3 and 2 and 1

0 = All LEDs disabled 1 = LED 1 2 = LED 2 3 = LED 1 and 2 4 = LED 3 5 = LED 3 and 1 6 = LED 3 and 2 7 = LED 3 and 2 and 1 8 = LED 4 9 = LED 4 and 1 10 = LED 4 and 2 11 = LED 4 and 2 and 1 12 = LED 4 and 3 13 = LED 4 and 3 and 1 14 = LED 4 and 3 and 2 15 = LED 4 and 3 and 2 and 1
Sets whether the top or the bottom paddle turns the load ON
0 = Top On 1 = Bottom On
Sets the supported fan type, 3 or 4 speed
0=3 speed fan 1=4 speed fan
